description:
Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law, but a reunion with his mixed up crew - and the loss of his extra legs - quickly dampens the captain`s enthusiasm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 2 Nenburi no Saikai! Luffy to Law
2年ぶりの再会! ルフィとロー
Meeting Again After Two Years! Luffy and Law
Réunis après deux ans ! Luffy et Law
Первая встреча спустя 2 года! Луффи и Ло!
لقاء آخر بعد عامين! لوفي ولو!
